CLAUSE 2: R
Risk Level: standard Word Count: 48
ecruitment Actual direct and indirect operating costs to the service provider associated with
recruitment activities plus a net mark-up at determined by the service provider at its
absolute discretion. However, the mark- up must not exceed 10% of actual direct
and indirect operating costs to the service
user_impact: You must follow these low-risk requirements or face consequences.
